subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When Dan Rooney gave his speech welcoming the the Steelers to training camp last summer, his message was different from any he or his father, Art, had made in the club’s 76-year history.
snippet: When Dan Rooney gave his speech welcoming the the Steelers to training camp last summer, his message was different from any he or his father, Art, had made in the club’s 76-year history.
